main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified fireball phenomena observed in Arizona and New Mexico between December 20, 1948, and January 1, 1949.
interesting points: The fireball was described as an intense blue-white light about the size of a basketball with a faint tail,At one point, two smaller objects separated from the main light,The fireball was observed moving at high speed and then disappeared behind terrain,Reports noted that it traveled in an almost horizontal path at various elevations,Various descriptions included sightings from different observers, including military personnel and civilians.
witness description: military personnel and civilians observing the sky
